name: Solid Organ Transplant 2024 CNE Nursing Conference
content: Live (in-person) and Livestream (virtual) attendance options. Central Time Zone This conference will provide an overview of new and advancing solid organ transplant clinical practices. Sessions will focus on living donor updates, pre-transplant treatments, ethics, patient education, and patient stories. ANCC and ABTC credit will be available to learners. This live CNE conference is designed for nurses and healthcare professionals caring for solid organ transplant patients. Upon completion of this activity, participants should be able to: - Identify emerging technologies and impact on transplant care and coordination. - Outline updates in transplant pharmacology. - List two nursing considerations when caring for solid organ transplant patients. Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2331143-0?pid=4868 Venue details: Hilton Rochester Mayo Clinic Area, 10 East Center Street, 4th Floor, Doctors Mayo Hall, Rochester, Minnesota, 55904, United States Price: General Admission: USD 500.00 Time: 07:00 to 17:00
